REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0003 reute u f BC-SWISS-MONEY-MARKET-PA 03-03 0074

TEXT.TITLE: SWISS MONEY MARKET PAPER YIELDS 3.286 PCT
TEXT.BODY: The Swiss Federal Government's new series of six-month money market certificates raised 177.5 mln Swiss francs at an issue price of 98.401 pct to give an average annual yield of 3.286 pct, the National Bank said. Payment date is March 5. The last series of six-month paper issued in January raised 159.6 mln francs at 98.392 pct to give an average yield of 3.251 pct. REUTER
